StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdatePersonnelAssignmentAndBillet]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID as integer, @Organiza.onID as integer, @Recrui.ngRoleID as varchar(2), @TourBeginDate as date.me, @BilletBeginDate as date.me, @UserLogin as varchar(15) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @DBID INT DECLARE @DBNAME NVARCHAR(128) SET @DBID = DB_ID() SET @DBNAME = DB_NAME()
DECLARE @BeginDate date.me DECLARE @ShortDescrip.on varchar(15) DECLARE @MaxBilletBeginDate date.me DECLARE @MaxBilletEndDate date.me
SELECT @MaxBilletBeginDate = MAX(BILLET_BEGIN_DATE) FROM Recruiter_History WHERE Recrui.ng_Person_Id = @PersonId
SELECT @MaxBilletEndDate = MAX(BILLET_END_DATE) FROM Recruiter_History WHERE Recrui.ng_Person_Id = @PersonId
IF @BilletBeginDate < @MaxBilletBeginDate BEGIN RAISERROR ('Billet Begin date can not be prior to a previous begin date in the Recruiter history table.', 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
IF @BilletBeginDate < @MaxBilletEndDate BEGIN RAISERROR ('Billet Begin date can not be prior to a previous end date in the Recruiter history table.', 16, 1, @DBID, @DBNAME) RETURN END
Select @BeginDate = Tour_Begin_Date From Recrui.ng_Person Where Recrui.ng_Person_Id = @PersonId
Select @ShortDescrip.on = rr.Short_Descrip.on From Recrui.ng_Person rp, Recrui.ng_Role rr Where rp.Recrui.ng_Person_Id = @PersonId and rp.Recrui.ng_Role_id = rr.Recrui.ng_Role_Id
EXEC sp_InsertRecruiterHistory @PersonId = @PersonId, @BeginDate = @BeginDate, @BilletEndDate = @BilletBeginDate, @ShortDescrip.on = @ShortDescrip.on, @UserLogin = @UserLogin
UPDATE RECRUITING_PERSON SET ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID, RECRUITING_ROLE_ID = @Recrui.ngRoleID, TOUR_BEGIN_DATE = @TourBeginDate, BILLET_BEGIN_DATE = @BilletBeginDate, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE RECRUITING_PERSON_ID = @PersonID
SET NOCOUNT OFF
